WebComics™ is the ultimate destination for Comic & Manhwa fans worldwide, offering the latest and hottest authentic comic series. Whether you're a fan of Manga, Manhwa, or Webtoon, we provide exhilarating and high-definition comic reads of numerous genres, including Romance, Action, Fantasy, Comedy, BL, GL, Drama, Horror, and more. If you fancy billionaires, destined partners, dominant CEOs, vampires, love triangles, otherworldly adventures, time-travel, enemies-to-lovers, or contractual marriage, it's your go-to platform for reading the best stories. Come and enjoy reading webtoons on www.webcomicsapp.com.
 
Why Choose WebComics™
1. A World of Infinite Comic & Manga Excitement
WebComics™ presents top-notch and exclusive comics, manga & manhwa from acclaimed creators across the globe. Our all-covered genres cater to your every interest and preference!
2. Unparalleled Experience in Reading Exclusive Comics & Manhwa
WebComics™ offers a plethora of exclusive original manhwa, manga & webtoons featuring distinctive and innovative storytelling, unparalleled creativity, and a reading experience that stands out as top-tier.

Indulge in daily free reading perks on WebComics™, catering to fans of Romance, Action, Fantasy, or LGBTQ genres. Come back each day for our newest free manhwa, webtoon & manga giveaway events!

We push personalized and captivating manhwa & manga suggestions that perfectly align with your interests.
5. Free Downloads and Offline Reading Convenience
No Internet? Download your preferred stories at no cost and enjoy them offline, ideal for travel or time killing.

Goojara – The Browser That Knows You Best

The internet should feel simple, fast, and personal. That’s why we built Goojara—a browser designed around you. With privacy at its core, speed in every tap, and a smart hub for all your favorite content—Goojara makes surfing the web effortless and enjoyable.

Key Features

- Zero Footprints. Total Privacy.
Browse like a ghost in full incognito mode. Goojara keeps no traces of your activity, giving you complete control of your digital life.

- Blazing Fast. Always Smooth.
Lightning-speed page loads and seamless navigation keep you moving at the pace of the web—no waiting, no lag.

- Shortcuts That Stick.
Your favorite sites are always just one tap away. Pin Google, YouTube, Instagram, or any site you love for instant access.

- One Hub for Everything You Love.
Video • Entertainment • AI • Sports • Social — all neatly organized in one clean, easy-to-use bookmarks hub.

- Jump Back In, Instantly.
Revisit saved pages and history with intuitive panels built for quick retrieval. No clutter, no confusion—just your web, remembered.

- Weather, Right in Your Browser.
Stay prepared with real-time local weather updates, built directly into Goojara. No extra apps needed.

With Goojara, you’re not just browsing—you’re living smarter, faster, and safer. It’s your web, simplified.

For an uninterrupted experience, consider subscribing to access all app features without ads through an auto-renewing subscription available on a weekly, monthly, or yearly basis. Stay Connected. Stay Informed. Stay Ahead with the Fiji Sun App.

The official Fiji Sun app brings you the latest breaking news, in-depth features, and real-time updates straight from the heart of the Pacific. Whether you're in Fiji or abroad, the Fiji Sun app keeps you connected to what matters most.

Key Features:
Breaking News Alerts: Get instant updates on major headlines, weather warnings, and important announcements.
E-Edition Access: Flip through the digital replica of the Fiji Sun print edition with intuitive swipe navigation.
Reader Accounts: Log in to subscribe to our premium newsletters, manage profile information, and access e-edition content.
Weather Updates: Stay prepared with accurate weather forecasts and alerts for your region.

Why Choose Fiji Sun?
Trusted by thousands of readers, the Fiji Sun is your source for credible, independent journalism, offering a voice for Fiji and the Pacific. With our app, you can dive deeper into stories that impact your community and the wider world.

Get award-winning global reporting from The Washington Post. The app is free to download and keeps you informed with expert coverage from Post journalists.

PRODUCT FEATURES
• Stay informed with the 24/7 feed of today’s news.
• Wake up with The 7, a better morning briefing on the day’s most important and interesting stories.
• Customize your alerts to be the first to know when news is breaking.
• Catch up with today’s stories by listening to original podcasts and audio articles.
• Discover something new in My Post, a curated feed with recommendations just for you.
• Dive deeper into Post journalism with innovative graphics, video, and augmented reality exclusives.

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
• Options: Download the free app and enjoy a limited number of complimentary stories each month. Get your first month of unlimited access for free, and only $11.99/month thereafter for your digital subscription.
• Extras: Your subscription to The Washington Post lets you access The Post from all your devices, on the web and in the app. Premium subscribers also enjoy a bonus subscription to share and exclusive eBooks written by our journalists.
• Payment: Payment will be charged to your iTunes account with the confirmation of your purchase.
• Auto-renewal: Your subscription will auto-renew for $11.99 each month unless you cancel 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. The auto-renewal can be turned off at any time in the Account Settings section of the App Store. Please note, you will be unable to cancel your current subscription during an active subscription period.
• Free trial: Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

- Price: The charges of the Check-in Coins Pack for a monthly billing period are USD 5, 7, 10 and 13, a quarterly billing period USD 14, 20, 29 and 38, and a yearly billing period USD 60 and 98.

Subscriptions are automatically charged each billing period, whether monthly or another period, and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginning of each billing period.

• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/

A Note From Our Founder and Editor in Chief,
Hello! Welcome to Kandy Magazine. First, thank you to the 1% who clicked  ...more. When I founded Kandy 14 years ago, I had a simple mission - deliver a new kind of men's magazine. A magazine which was more visual than words. Our first 2012 iPad issue delivered. A year later our first iPhone issue raised the bar. We told stories visually more than textually. We were a hit!

In our early years, we kept to this vision, consistently publishing pictorials which told the story. A photo and a cute blurb or brief caption. As we grew in popularity - yes it is true that in 2014 we were the most popular magazine in the app store, more popular than People, Cosmo, Men's Health and GQ - higher profile celebrities desired the exposure Kandy delivered. To accommodate, we moved away from our fun, creative visual magazine towards your traditional, boring editorial magazine. That was our first mistake. 

Shortly thereafter, the new layout caught the attention of potential ad reps who advised we tone down the sexy and increase the text in articles. That was our second mistake. It did not take long for our readership to drop and our global audience as well. 

To be fair, our decline was not all self-induced. In our rocket ship rise to the top of the app store rankings, we maximized Apple's newsstand app exposure. It was where you went to discover magazines, much in the way when you would walk into a bookstore or by a street vendor magazine newsstand. It showed the current cover of the most recent issue and with our magazine covers who would not be intrigued to check out Kandy. However, in a perfect storm of events outside our influence, big publishers sold their private newsstand app to Apple which turned it into what you know today as News+. Kandy is excluded. 


Starting now, we are returning to our photo story issues. More girls, more photos, less words. What you wanted in the beginning and what you want today. We are not an adult magazine, there is no nudity. Our photos are classic glamour, bikini swimsuit and lingerie. I hope you enjoy Kandy.

They say every picture tells a story. Kandy digital / mobile magazine lets pictures tell the story. It is for men who enjoy Live Sports events, fitness and exercise programs combined with the latest men's fashion and watch style. You will become a Kandy magazine subscriber to the app.

If you are only fans of of Premier Leagues, UEFA or NFL football or enjoy F1, Rugby and Golf and the scores as well, Kandy magazine has all your live sporting interests covered.

Of course, any real man enjoys a wide range of topics, Kandy delivers what you need. Current trends for men's fashion, style and the hottest Rolex, Omega, Tag Heuer, Patek Philippe watches men are buying.

Are you old school, classic lads magazine reader who loved Loaded, Maxim magazine, FHM, Esquire, Nuts, Front, Zoo, Men's Health, Stuff and GQ? Kandy rolls all that good Stuff into its digital issues optimized for both iPads and iPhones. 

Follow us social media
Instagram @kandymazine
Facebook @kandymagazine
X @kandy_magazine
YouTube @kandymagazine

La référence de l’info locale dans l’Aude et les Pyrénées-Orientales.
Notre mission : vous informer de ce qui se passe près de chez vous, mais aussi en France et dans le monde.

LE QUOTIDIEN NUMERO 1 DANS L’AUDE ET LES PYRENEES-ORIENTALES

Retrouvez toute l’info de votre territoire sur l’Aude et les Pyrénées-Orientales: 
- Une couverture au quotidien de l’actualité de nos villages
- Des alertes infos pour être informés des sujets importants
- Infos, politique, justice, éducation… accédez à vos rubriques préférées
- Des podcasts dédiés

Géolocalisez-vous et suivez l’information près de chez vous : Perpignan, Narbonne, Carcassonne et plus de 659 communes.

DES SERVICES ADAPTES A VOTRE QUOTIDIEN
- Les prévisions météo détaillées par commune
- L’agenda des sorties par ville pour trouver facilement des idées d’activités
- Avis de décès pour consulter facilement les avis d’obsèques et remerciements
- La webradio de L’Indépendant

COMMENT CA MARCHE ?
Depuis votre écran d’accueil, choisissez 

- A la Une : pour retrouver les dernières actualités, les dossiers à la Une, Le Direct
- Ma ville : pour obtenir l’info locale de votre ville (info, faits-divers, météo, avis de décès, sorties)
- Favoris : pour accéder facilement les articles que vous avez appréciés ou que vous souhaitez lire à un autre moment de la journée
- Mon Compte : pour gérer vos paramètres d’abonnement, de notifications, de newsletters et vos préférences (villes, rubriques, thème de l’application sombre ou clair et la taille de la police)  
- Menu : pour retrouver toutes les rubriques de l’application et rechercher un article à partir de mots clés

ADAPTE A VOS BESOINS
- Composez votre écran d’accueil avec les rubriques de votre choix : Economie, Sport, Santé, France-Monde … 
- Choisissez votre ville ou commune pour obtenir des infos dédiées : Perpignan, Narbonne, Carcassonne… 
- Personnalisez vos notifications en sélectionnant uniquement ce qui vous intéresse : par régions ou thématiques 
- Réglez la taille de la police
- Choisissez le thème de l’application : sombre ou clair

5 BONNES RAISONS D’UTILISER L’APPLICATION
Suivez toute l’actualité locale, nationale et internationale
Personnalisez votre ville et vos rubriques
Recevez les alertes infos de votre choix
Une rédaction au cœur de Perpignan et des Agences dans les principales villes des régions


CE QU’EN DISENT NOS LECTEURS
“Super journal. Vous êtes géniaux et les premiers à envoyer des alertes nous vivons à Leucate 5 mois de l’année et achetons le journal. Bravo à votre équipe”
“L’Indépendant porte bien son nom ! C’est un journal ouvert à tous. J’ai découvert dcette appli il y a peu et je compte m’y abonner car elle informe justement en temps réel et ne prend aucun parti pris”
“Super appli ! Je conseille à tout le monde, je regarde tous les jours, ça me donne les actualités”

LES PODCASTS 
Découvrez une autre approche de l’info avec nos podcasts
- SPORT avec Décrassage 
- JEUX VIDEOS avec Game Over par Yohann Lemore 
- HISTOIRE avec C’était aujourd’hui 
- CULTURE GENERALE avec l’apéro Quizz pour jouer 15min ensemble, chaque weekend
- ARCHIVES de L’Indépendant avec Je vous parle d’un temps

L’INDEPENDANT ABONNES
Avec près de 80 journalistes et 600 correspondants locaux, L’Indépendant analyse et à diffuse les intiatives qui apportent des réponses concrètes à des problèmes de société, économiques, sociaux et écologiques.

Pour soutenir la presse locale, abonnez-vous et profitez de nombreux avantages : 
- Tous les articles en illimité
- Une lecture sans publicité
- Sur tous vos supports (web, app, tablette) via votre compte
- Le club abonnés
- Des newsletters exclusives
- Sans engagement
- Le journal en version numérique en avant-première dès 23h la veille

Choisissez la formule de votre choix dans l’application à partir de 0,99€. 
Gérez votre abonnement depuis “Mon compte” dans l’application. 

Consultez les Conditions Générales : http://www.lindependant.fr/idevice/3.5/conf_appstore.html
